name: Taikyoku Igo: Heisei Kiin
overview: Dr. Ken Chen, an authority on Go thinking routines and the winner of the "International Go Congress" and many other titles in various Go software competitions, created a powerful and fast thinking engine for Taikyoku Igo: Heisei Kiin, which has an established reputation for its high speed, and you can choose from four different computer levels. From beginners to advanced players, all levels of players can play at their own level. In addition, there is a "Basic Introduction" for beginners to help them learn the basics of Go in an easy way. In addition, there are two types of Go boards, the 'Nine-Joint Board' and the 'Thirteen-Joint Board'.
